description: THAT IS THE PROBLEM WITH THIS CORRUPT WORLD NOW!! IF PEOPLE ACTUALLY BELIEVED IN THE HEAVENLY FATHER AND HIS WORD AND FOLLOWED HIS COMMANDMENTS, WE WOULD BE LIVING IN A PERFECT WORLD. BUT INSTEAD PEOPLE WANT TO LIVE IN SIN AND HOW THEY WANT AND THAT IS WHY THIS WORLD WILL BE DESTROYED TO MAKE WAY FOR THE NEW HEAVEN AND EARTH! BUT JUST REMEMBER, YOU DO NOT LIVE FOREVER AND THERE IS AN ETERNAL LAKE OF FIRE WAITING FOR THE WICKED AND SIN LOVERS! THE ONLY PEOPLE THAT CALL THIS FEAR MONGERING ARE THE ONES THAT LOVE AND ARE GUILTY PF WHAT IM TALKING ABOUT! JUDGEMENT IS COMING! #hollyweirdisevil
